name: Tank Shooting-Survival Battle
description:
The best tank shooting and surviving casual game ever that can`t stop playing at anywhere and anytime! Choose your unique tank for battle, challenge boss and get higher rank to become the most powerful tank! Be careful! Know the battlefield and get over various obstacles and traps! Get the coins that can upgrade firepower, speed, accuracy and more, join us and become our Tank Hero!

How to paly？
Control virtual control lever to move your tank around
Make the right shot as they show up and come close. Your tank will aim at your enemy automatically.
Skillfully avoid traps and obstacles on the battlefield
Use coins to upgrade your tank and make it more powerful.
Unlock next level when you reach the target of each level
Defeat the Big Boss appears in the game at random times quickly, or you`ll die!

Game Features:
Real-time tank battle gameplay with easy control
Automatically targeting offered.
Different play level and boss to challenge.
3D characters and gorgeous combat visual effect
Cool tanks for your choice. Choose your favorite one!
Various cool weapon upgrade to make you powerful ad break- back
